items.title: Wealth inequality and the 'K-shaped' economy are more striking than ever, data shows
items.description: The K-shaped economy is as apparent as ever and isn't going away anytime soon, economists say.

items.title: Hassett praises Trump's pick of Warsh to lead Fed, says he has his 'dream job' already
items.description: The NEC director, once considered a clear frontrunner for the next Fed chair, said he is fine with his current role.

items.title: Trump to announce Fed chair nominee Friday; Kevin Warsh may be his pick, according to reports
items.description: President Donald Trump said Thursday that he will be naming his pick Friday for the new Federal Reserve chair.

items.description: China rolled out a new work plan to boost services consumption as stimulus measures to boost households spending on goods have so far done little to l...

items.title: Trade deficit soared 94% in November and was higher than a year ago, despite tariff efforts
items.description: The U.S. deficit with its global trading partners nearly doubled in November as the shortfall with the European Union swelled.
